page.title: 03GOOLE'S SHOPS
page.content: Goole has a wide range of{shops,}the majority of them situated on Boothferry Road and Pasture Road. Along Boothferry Road,well served by a large free car park, are nationwide stores such as Woolworths,Boots,Marks and Spencers,Halfords and Currys interspaced with smaller specialist shops:-jewellers,bakers,boutiques etc. The shops of Boothferry Road are well established and the area has an air of stability about it. In Pasture Road however where shops are smaller, the shops are of a more transient nature. Almost every week shops open and close then re-open selling different commodities under new management or ownership. Video libraries,shops selling ladies fashions,carpets,bicycles,toys,cards and electrical goods have come and gone over the last two years.
